definition[0]: used to say that you understand and agree with what someone has just said
example[0]: ‘That girl has some major problems.’ ‘Yeah, no kidding.’
definition[1]: used to emphasize a threat or that you are telling the truth
example[1]: If you break that thing, you’ll be grounded for a week – no kidding.
example[2]: And then he saw us and – no kidding – he asked us if we wanted a ride.
